Articles.Content:
Does anyone know how to make a lifting body type MK3 craft that works with out flipping like a bullet during reentry? I guess since building interplanetary duna shuttles like the Martian is useless I guess this is the best course for my career mode also I don’t like doing Matt lowne style Apollo duna missions with Oberth effects oh I reverted to his design as I don’t know how todo the belly flop and still don’t know how to do the robotics parts. Pic at the bottom for attention. Any tips?

 

Edited December 28, 2021 by Cloakedwand72

On 12/28/2021 at 5:57 PM, Cloakedwand72 said:

Does anyone know how to make a lifting body type MK3 craft that works with out flipping like a bullet during reentry?


Can you describe exactly what behavior you're seeing?  What do you mean by "flipping like a bullet"?  And which part are you talking about, the upper stage?

Got a screenshot?
